pr_title: add shaded guava collections and use it

timeline.message: add shaded guava collections and use it in Field

timeline.bodyText:
The next level would be for input methods to TAKE immutablke lists.  eg here we throw the responsibility back onto the caller to give us an immutable list.
Thoughts?
If we did this, then com.google.collect.ImmutableList becomes implicit API.
timeline.author: bbakerman

replies.bodyText: We don't need to make it explicit: If you give us a (GraphQL Java) Immutable List it is already optimized inside Guava itself.
replies.author: andimarek

timeline.bodyText:
Didnt want to put a of helper here

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe renamed ImmutableMapWithNullValues.empty() =to ImmutableMapWithNullValues.emptyMap() - this would be clearer in my book and also better on static import
this.variables = builder.variables == null ? emptyMap() : builder.variables;
timeline.author: bbakerman
